moves.9. Nbd2 Nf6 10. h3: leaving black less and less possibilities
moves.10... Nc8: trying to find space on the queen side
moves.12... Nh5 13. a4 Nf4: this may seem a mistake, but my purpose was clearly to open spaces, even though my pawns would face doubling.
moves.14. Bxf4 exf4: for a few moves, this pawn is safe... it won't last.
moves.15. Rc1 O-O 16. a5: chasing the only piece from queen side. Maybe I should have played a5 sooner.
moves.18... Ne7 19. Qd2 Be5: preferring my pawn than this bad bishop. And more: white knights are dangerous.
moves.20. Nxe5 dxe5 21. Nf3 f6 22. c4: main attack by white: the pawns!
moves.25... Qb8 26. d6 Rf7: knight cannot be taken due to queen esposition.
moves.27. Qe2 Nc8: focusing the only possible target: b5.
moves.28. Rcd1 Na7 29. Qc4: and now, white will try to penetrate with this advanced pawn...
moves.30. Rfe1: maybe this was a loss of time
moves.30... Rdd7: combining the rooks for their safety and overprotecting b7.
moves.31. Qe6: i think that white forgot to use his knight.
moves.31... h6: reducing possibilities of the white knight in case of king-side pawns advancing.
moves.32. Rd3: white still lacks of ideas: there is no possibility to advance on d-line with the rooks.
moves.35. fxg3: white has oppened a good line: it was the thing to do!
moves.35... Rf8: preparing the exchange of queen to avoid a task force against f6
moves.36... Qe8 37. Qh3: the queen wants to still focusing on d7; good idea.
moves.37... Qf7: focusing on the other side, threatening an intermediate check if possible
moves.38. Rf1: preparing the attack on f6, with an advance against g5
moves.38... Rfd8 39. h5: my mistake... it was on h5. The knight can now go on h4
moves.39... g5: not anymore... but this is where white stopped to play. This is too bad, because I was planning a draw and the good possibilities on f6 were interesting for white...the last soldier for black could be the knight on d5, in case the rook on d column leaves its place to focus on column... well, many things, many things!

gameName: interesting game... until a strange end...
